title: Why does brand's W cost less mana than E early game?
body: W can be used to poke from distance, while E actually requires brand walk up to a counter-playable distance. If brand's early game W mana cost got increased and E early game mana cost got decreased, brand support wouldn't be as oppressive as right now to play against in lane. It's definitely fine to have a window of powerspike like having an ult that works very well against 2 opponents, but it should also come with weaker pre-6 laning.

Uh, few problems with this statement.

1: Giving mages free, cheap, reliable, and devastating damage tends to lead to them skull-fucking anything with a shorter range. This includes assassins, because their slippery gimmicks and engage tools tend to have significantly longer cooldowns than point-and-click nukes. 

To an extent you see this already with mages bullying assassins throughout much of the early game with autos, 

2: Mages can't just go mid and bot, they can also go top. We've hit balance points before (s3 and s4 most noticeably) where mages in general shoved all but the most over-bearing of the top laners out of the lane and.. basically removed them from the game. Absolutely no melee has the tools to survive sustained poke and harass from mages and ranged; so if you give too much reliable to mages too early in the lane phase, the only melee who can hope to lane against them are the ones who can basically kill them as soon as the poking starts. Things like Renekton / Panth level 2 all ins, and such.
